USE SalesDB;
GO;

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Products
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT FormatCsv

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT FormatCsv
WITH (
 FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
 FORMAT_OPTIONS (
    FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
    STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
    FIRST_ROW=2 -- Omit header row (1).
 )   
);

-- And now create a table

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Products
(
    Id INT,
    BrandName VARCHAR(255),
    Name VARCHAR(255),
    Price DECIMAL(14, 10)
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION='products.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=csv,
    FILE_FORMAT=FormatCsv
)

-- And do your queries
SELECT * FROM Products
